name: Teanest Compact Table and Chairs WHITE
description:
The Teanest compact table and chairs is an elegant, practical and space saving design, well suited to anywhere where space at a premium, the two chairs simply slide out from underneath the table. The table is designed for two adults to sit and enjoy a cup of tea, it can also be used for a light meal, as well as being suitable for laptop use.


The Teanest set is made in London, in small batches as numbered editions. Constructed from CNC routed birch plywood, the pieces are then laminated to expose the end grain, then hand finished. The design also features side panels that unbolt, making it possible to flat pack and change the panels. The sides come coated in hard wearing coloured polypropylene, which is available in red, white or black, other finishes are available upon request. 

Dimensions
Height :760mm
Width: 450mm 
Depth: 530mm

Made to order, dispatched within 4 weeks.

name: Herbivore Indoor Planter
description: Herbivore is an indoor planter designed to accommodate three standard sized supermarket herb pots, not only this but it can also be used to grow your own herbs thanks to drainage holes and a matching tray. With a simple clean design it matches the aesthetic of most kitchens, whilst echoing the shape of a traditional plant pot. Produced with a glazed finish, and made from China clay in Stoke on Trent in England.

name: Herbivore Indoor Planter + Stelf
description:
Herbivore is an indoor planter designed to accommodate three standard sized supermarket herb pots, not only this but it can also be used to grow your own herbs thanks to drainage holes and a matching tray. With a simple clean design it matches the aesthetic of most kitchens, whilst echoing the shape of a traditional plant pot. Produced with a glazed finish, and made from China clay in Stoke on Trent in England.

The Stelf is a shelf that follows the lines of the base of the Herbivore.  With the fixings hidden behind the planter the Herbivore appears to float in mid air. They are made in the UK from 2mm powder coated steel, making them strong and hard wearing.

name: Stelf (Herbivore Shelf)
description: The Stelf is a shelf that follows the lines of the base of the Herbivore.  With the fixings hidden behind the planter the Herbivore appears to float in mid air. They are made in the UK from 2mm powder coated steel, making them strong and hard wearing. Herbivore sold separately.
